testsuite.name: NumbersTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #56
Expected number is 77 but actual number is 14.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Welcome to Amazing Numbers!
Supported requests: - enter a natural number to know its properties; - enter two natural numbers to obtain the properties of the list: * the first parameter represents a starting number; * the second parameters show how many consecutive numbers are to be processed; - two natural numbers and a property to search for; - two natural numbers and two properties to search for; - separate the parameters with one space; - enter 0 to exit.
